koti thrasthawadin wellamulla wayikkal muhudu werale wala dama thibiyadi yuda humuda kalathuwakku awi 05k soya ganimath samangama ema pradeshaya pura dawantha sodisi meheyumak yuda hamudawa aarambha kara thibe.yuda gatum pawathi samaye mema pradeshaya yuda muktha kalapayak lesa nam kara thibu athara ema pradeshaya pura mewani bara awi koti thrasthawadin wala dama athayi yuda hamudawa sakakarayi.yuda hamudawe bim bomba sambandhawa wishesha puhunuwa labu bhata piris nawa thakshanika mewalam yoda ganimin mema bhumiya pariksha karana ayuru madhyawedinta eeye (02) siyasin daka bala gatha haki wiya.koti thrasthawadin waladama thibiyadi yuda hamudawa soya gath kala thuwakku awi pahak eeye (02) godaganu labiya.widyuth saha mudritha madhya aayathana rasaka samajikayan mema awasthawata sahabhagi wi sitinu daka gatha haki wiya.68 wani senankadhipathi mejar janaral jagath wijethilaka saha, ema pradeshaya bhara hamuda pradhanihu rasak mema awasthawata ekwa sitinu daka gatha haki wiya..

rasama rasa kama welak , punchi patikkiyange athin uyapu rathu hale bathakata , rasata rasa pol sambal , wambatu moju , ambaaralla wanjana , aluthma aluth pala mallumak (ee patawu godak elawalu pala warga wawanawa ) , parippu , malu mishra karapu malu miris wanjanayak ...sathutata kiya gena giyata dan mata aayeth badaginanak enawa , mokada dan welawa ude namayahamarayi , me wade awasanayak karalama patharasaya waladanna oona , me athare ape dinithi akka , mithili nangita kama kawanawa , hari aasawen ee katha ahagena thamayi me wade dan awasan karanne .
